author: keith
content:
Hi Zen, 

Unfortunately, I don't use Hulu on a regular basis, I use a VPN instead. It cost money, but provides far more security, and works across multiple devices (including smartphones, tablets...)

If you're considering a VPN, I recommend PrivateInternetAccess https://www.keithrozario.com/2013/09/best-vpn-malaysia-privateinternetaccess.html

Keith
